snippet: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees said Wednesday that a refugee crisis was looming in Central and North America as people flee unchecked gang violence.
abstract: United Nations official warns of possible refugee crisis in Central and North America as rampant gang violence forces people from their home countries.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees said Wednesday that a refugee crisis was looming in Central and North America as people flee unchecked gang violence.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Violence Creating Refugee Crisis, a Senior U.N. Official Warns
headline.main: Violence Creating Refugee Crisis, a U.N. Commissioner Warns
